oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photographs - house
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: houses; Vance, R. H.; buildings;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of an original house. Caption reads, "Many of the original homes, such as this one built by clothing magnate R.H. Vance, still stand today."
